title: D Party
content:
Gossip Gurl here, your one and only source into the scandalous lives of Vancouver’s not that quite elite. The night is young and so are we. So put out your night look and get ready to party.

Apparently the D is hosting a party. B is attending, but what about the rest? Last we heard the D might have overcrowded his guestlist, yet he surely managed to make space for R. But did he make space for A? Well, we know Alexa craves for a D, but if an offer came from this D, would she accept the offer? I doubt it. And why has the D invited R? First of all we know R has been quite lonely in his house alone. But is an offer of D a worthy cause for R? I guess the D is making an attempt to be friends, but I guess he did not get the memo. Cause R is not really interested in people who blows off his friends. So the real question is will R attend the party? That’s the secret we want to know. You know you love me, 
XOXO Gossip Gurl

title: Joe? Does he even go here?
content: Lonely Boy’s whereabouts still unknown... is he still alive? Maybe. Big shocker? Not really.
